page.title: 16MEDIA FORRES EAST
page.content: Media locally in this area centres on the weekly newspaper the {Moray and {Nairn Gazette.}It costs 15p and is published on a Wednesday. It contains weekly features like {Woman's World.} The local deaths, births and marriages column is of great interest. The paper carries a wide range of advertisements from articles for sale to coffee mornings, discos, fund raising events. Of interest, recently have been reports on the{Forres by pass, a new {supermarket and }a strange {black {cat-like}animal seen in the area.
